overview: If youâ€™ve ever wanted to be more productive on the water, this is your chance. This unique film offers an expert window into all things bait presentation from two of the most respected and experienced fishing vessel owner/operators on the entire west coast. Starting with basics, Frank LoPreste and Randy Toussaint walk us through Advanced Casting Techniques step-by-step to boost your angling game.
title: Casting Techniques of the Pros
